entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who kicked a chair leg. He is described as being hungry and snarling at Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one to whom Ron is speaking. She is described as clapping her hand to her forehead and startling both of them into silence.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who has been fighting dementors and wearing a Horcrux. He is described as being stung by Hermione's words.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as the creatures that Harry has been fighting. They are described as being a threat to Harry and his friends.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is mentioned as an object that Harry is still wearing. It is described as having a heavy weight pressing on Harry's stomach.

relationships.description: Ron speaks to Hermione, expressing his hunger and frustration. ("What?" he snarled at Hermione.)
Harry fights against the dementors, as mentioned by Ron. ("You go and fight your way through the dementors, then," said Harry.)
Harry is still wearing the Horcrux, as mentioned by Hermione. ("Come on," she said impatiently, clicking her fingers at him, "the Horcrux, Harry, you're still wearing it!")
Hermione removes the Horcrux from Harry's neck. (She held out her hands, and Harry lifted the golden chain over his head.)
